metadata.inclusion:
1. Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
2. When prompted by your primary controller, click the button three times in one second
metadata.exclusion:
1. Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
2. When prompted by your primary controller, click the button three times in one second
metadata.reset:
Triple-tap and hold to reset, LED indicator will blink red 5 times to confirm successful reset
(Node:Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.)
